name: Kiko
description: "Kiko is a gray Dragon with supporting capabilities
column11: Kiko can heal and buff allies' attack making him a solid and balanced character."

name: Ampy
description: "Ampy is a Purple Dragon with high damage output with a defense reducing skill
column11: a fearful dragon at its finest."

name: Chloe
description: "Chloe is a menacing human that specializes in bleeding the enemy
column11: I'd suggest to stay away from her if you don't want to get bitten."

name: Nell
description: "Nell is a shielder that swore to protect all of his allies
column11: taking hits with reduced damage is his specialty."
